sense.def:
To move back
pomeni premakniti se v nasprotno smer od tiste, kamor smo obrnjeni.

Z besedo
back
povemo, da se nekdo ali nekaj vrne na določen kraj ali v določeno stanje.

seg.quote: I went back to the kitchen.
She put it back on the shelf.

sense.def:
To get something back
pomeni nekaj dobiti, potem ko tistega nekaj časa nismo imeli.

To do something back
pomeni nekomu narediti tisto, kar je on storil nam.

seg.quote: He looked at her, and the girl stared back.
I shall make some enquiries and call you back.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo ali nekaj
kept
ali
situated back from a place
, je v določeni razdalji od tistega kraja.

seg.quote: Police struggled to keep the crowd back.
The house is set back from the road.

sense.def:
Z besedo
back
povemo, da govorimo ali razmišljamo o nečem, kar se je zgodilo v preteklosti.

seg.quote: I invested in the company way back in 1971.
Think back to what we've said.

sense.def:
One's back
je del telesa od vratu do pasu na nasprotni strani kot prsi, trebuh in obraz.

The back of something
je del nečesa, postavljen v ozadje ali kar najdlje od ospredja.

seg.quote: Sign on the back of the prescription form.
He went to the small counter at the back of the store.
The back wheels were spinning in the mud.

sense.def:
The back of a chair
je del stola; nanj se naslonimo.

Cesta, ki je
back
, je ozka in malo prometna.

Kadar avtomobil
backs
ali kadar človek
backs a car
, pelje avtomobil vzvratno.

seg.quote: She backed out of the driveway.

sense.def:
To back someone
pomeni nekomu dati podporo ali denar.

seg.quote: The organization is backed by the U.N.

sense.def:
To back a particular person, team, or horse
pomeni, da na tekmovanju vložimo denar za zmago neke osebe, moštva ali konja.

To move back and forth
pomeni večkrat se premakniti v eno smer in potem v nasprotno.

cit.quote: sem in tja, naprej in nazaj

seg.quote: Someone was pacing back and forth behind the curtains.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj oblečemo
back to front
, tisto oblečemo tako, da je zadnja stran oblačila na telesu spredaj.

To do something behind someone's back
pomeni nekaj storiti, ne da bi prizadeti človek to vedel.

To turn one's back on someone or something
pomeni, da se za nekoga ali nekaj ne zmenimo ali mu nočemo pomagati.

seg.quote: We have turned our backs on the very principles we were elected to uphold.

sense.def:
To back away
pomeni iti stran zaradi živčnosti ali strahu.

To back down
pomeni odpovedati se svoji prejšnji zahtevi ali terjatvi.

To back off
pomeni iti proč, da se izognemo težavam ali boju.

To back out
pomeni skleniti, da ne bomo storili nečesa, v kar smo prej privolili.

To back up a statement
pomeni predložiti dokaze, s katerimi pokažemo, da je neka izjava resnična.

To back someone up
pomeni nekomu pomagati in mu stati ob strani.
